column1: The Pit Room////The verdict on the BBQ and chicken tacos was that the brisket was pretty decent. There was a light peppercorn and smoke to the brisket. The pork ribs had good flavor with their rub
column2: but it was not fall off the bone. The highlight for the three meat plate was the jalapeño cheddar sausage
column3: because of its big pieces of cheddar that absolutely melted in your mouth and the jalapeño that gives it a kick. The chicken tacos had grilled garlic on top which was different and their shredded chicken was tasty.
